title: Border, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen foundation
Technique: cross stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Border from a table cover or hanging made from three pieces stitched together. The top has a repeat of a star in an octagon in red embroidery. The middle piece has a narrow scroll in red embroidery along the top and bottom edge. The bottom has a woven tape with weft fringe alternately red and white. The tape turns the corner at one end and ends halfway up the side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 19th century.Medium: cotton on linen foundation
Technique: cross stitch embroidery on plain weave. 1976-2-1.
